import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; export default function Productdetails() { const [data,Setdata]=useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ fetch(process.env.REACT_APP_API + '/v1/products/getsingleproduct/') .then(res=>res.json()) .then((res)=>Setdata(res)) },[]) return (
